channel.title: World 3 _ The next generation in servers
channel.description:
[B]World 3 [/B] - The Next Generation In Servers -
[B]Features[/B] At world 3 we want to provide a creative but fun and somewhat emulation of RuneScape. We will be aiming at the 317 feel of RuneScape, using the gameframe a nd that style of creativity of course. But we will be adding new concepts such as the godsword, lunar magics, etc. We will have a dedicated and [B]helpful[/B] staff that will also aid to the success of the server. As of right now the current features of World 3 are:
[U]Currently Working On:[/U] [B]Battle Minigame[/B]
Working stalls[/COLOR] Working Waves[/COLOR] Working Catapult[/COLOR] Working Store
[U]Bosses:[/U] [B]King Black Dragon[/B] Working alternate flames(White,Red,Blue) Dragonfire shield works to block flame Multi Area Aggressive
[B]Kalphite Queen[/B]
Rope needed to get into lair Tunnels Morphing from version 1 to version 2 Veracs hits through prayer
[B]GodWars[/B]
Map data loaded correctly Bosses have their animations Bosses have drops Minions
[RIGHT] [B]Current Updates[/B]
[CODE][B]Updates:[/B] 9/16/10 - Added Slayer, tasks are based on combat level
9/15/10 - [URL=http://img.techpowerup.org/100915/Capture408.png]Added 100% KBD[/URL]
9/13/10 - [URL=http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/projects/264663-death-plateau-world-3-a.html]Death Plateau[/URL]
9/12/10 - [URL=http://img.techpowerup.org/100912/Capture393.png]Nicks Client[/URL]
9/12/10 - Tutorial Island [URL=http://i51.tinypic.com/35lzss3.jpg]Click Here[/URL]
9/11/10 - Adam rekicked, PC added
9/10/10 - [URL=http://i51.tinypic.com/dfu6w6.jpg]Mining Added[/URL]
9/9/10 - Fully resizable client - [URL=http://img.techpowerup.org/100909/Capture371.png]Click[/URL]
9/6/10-9/8/10: Added woodcutting, base for slayer
9/6/10-9/8/10:full working dueling jewerly teleports..
9/6/10-9/8/10: Shoes added to team Adam kicked.
9/6/10-9/8/10: Helix -> BladeScape
09/05/10: More dupes fixed etc...
09/05/10: Made a tiny bug fix for npcs
09/05/10: Made a slight edit in the bankX class
09/05/10: Fixed simple bugs
09/05/10: Uhh, made shopAssistant look neater
09/05/10: Fixed a dupe, I think.
09/05/10: Xlog fixed?
09/05/10: Edited the player saving class
09/05/10: Removed dead code
09/05/10: More misc updates
09/05/10: Misc server class update
09/05/10: A few dialogues added
09/05/10: Clue Scrolls Added
09/05/10: Pots Added 100%
09/05/10: Added better Dialogue System
09/05/10: Training Added
#/05/10: Added Minigame Teleporter
09/05/10: Added Npc teleport Player
09/04/10: [URL=http://i53.tinypic.com/dnk8ir.jpg]Training Added[/URL]
09/04/10: Thread Made
09/04/10: Added Thieving
09/04/10: Fixed Some Errors
09/04/10: Made logo[/CODE]
[B]Media[/B] Client Settings Interface <3 [IMG]http://img.techpowerup.org/100912/Capture393.png[/img] Clue Scrolls [IMG]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/2876/cluescrolls1.png[/img] [IMG]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/8042/cluescrolls2.png[/img] Skills Menus [IMG]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/8198/skillguides.png[/img]
[/RIGHT]
[CENTER]
Random Home??: [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/ngv6va.jpg[/img]
Dialogue One: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2d94ex2.jpg[/img]
Dialogue Two: [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/xlf6eg.jpg[/img]
Dialogue Three: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/3469d8l.jpg[/img]
Skills [U]Woodcutting[/U] Woodcutting is a very important skill for some other skills such as fletching and more. When you cut a tree it will turn into a tree stump and the tree will re-spawn again so you can keep cutting. Keep cutting untill you reach the level for next tree to cut, by woodcutting you can also earn much money & become rich and get the items you want.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/wlrqcy.jpg[/img]
[U]Mining[/U] Mining is very important skill for skillers and its very good to earn money, mining is also a good thing for smithing you mine ores and smith them and make armours if you're good in smithing. But mining itself is also very good to earn money by selling them for people who needs them and wants to make armours for themselves.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/dfu6w6.jpg[/img]
[U]Sea Troll Queen[/U] Sea Troll Queen has been added to a island far away from everything else. There you will be alone with the Sea Troll Queen and you will challenge the Queen. The Queen has some powerfull magic spells so you need to be carefull. The Queen is very strong so remember to get some food & potions with you.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/141866x.jpg[/img]
Minigames [U]Duel Arena[/U] Duel Arena is a minigame to see how good your skills are or if you want to fight your enemy or your friend. In this minigame you can also stake a fight but of course there is only challenging too without staking. When you stake, you fight for the items you staked, so if you win you get your items and your enemies items he staked. If you lose you lose your items and dont get the enemies items he staked.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2rnvl8k.jpg[/img]
[/CENTER]

@Sainnnnt wrote:

World 3

  • The Next Generation In Servers -

Features
At world 3 we want to provide a creative but fun and
somewhat emulation of RuneScape. We will be aiming
at the 317 feel of RuneScape, using the gameframe a
nd that style of creativity of course. But we will be adding
new concepts such as the godsword, lunar magics, etc.
We will have a dedicated and helpful staff that will
also aid to the success of the server. As of right now the
current features of World 3 are:

Currently Working On:
Battle Minigame

Working stalls[/COLOR]
Working Waves[/COLOR]
Working Catapult[/COLOR]
Working Store

Bosses:

Working alternate flames(White,Red,Blue)
Dragonfire shield works to block flame
Multi Area

Kalphite Queen

Rope needed to get into lair
Tunnels
Morphing from version 1 to version 2
Veracs hits through prayer

GodWars

Map data loaded correctly
Bosses have their animations
Bosses have drops
Minions

[RIGHT]
Current Updates

[CODE]Updates:
9/16/10 - Added Slayer, tasks are based on combat level

Random
Home??:

Dialogue Two:

Skills
Woodcutting
Woodcutting is a very important skill for some other skills such as fletching and more. When you cut a tree it will turn into a tree stump and the tree will re-spawn again so you can keep cutting. Keep cutting untill you reach the level for next tree to cut, by woodcutting you can also earn much money & become rich and get the items you want.

wlrqcy.jpg783×540

Mining
Mining is very important skill for skillers and its very good to earn money, mining is also a good thing for smithing you mine ores and smith them and make armours if you’re good in smithing. But mining itself is also very good to earn money by selling them for people who needs them and wants to make armours for themselves.

dfu6w6.jpg783×541

Sea Troll Queen
Sea Troll Queen has been added to a island far away from everything else. There you will be alone with the Sea Troll Queen and you will challenge the Queen. The Queen has some powerfull magic spells so you need to be carefull. The Queen is very strong so remember to get some food & potions with you.

141866x.jpg782×540

Minigames
Duel Arena
Duel Arena is a minigame to see how good your skills are or if you want to fight your enemy or your friend. In this minigame you can also stake a fight but of course there is only challenging too without staking. When you stake, you fight for the items you staked, so if you win you get your items and your enemies items he staked. If you lose you lose your items and dont get the enemies items he staked.

2rnvl8k.jpg783×541

[/CENTER]
